dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

In accordance with  your DMCA notice of alleged copyright infringement and takedown procedures at:



http://www.google.com/dmca.html



we attach hereto formal Notification of Copyright Infringement & Takedown Request  detailing the information, certifications, description and location of infringing material for your urgent attention.



We confirm that we have provided you with a user name and password to enable you to gain access to our password protected pages on our website: www.diamonds.net<http://www.diamonds.net>  to enable you to undertake your investigations and take down and disable access to the infringing material thereafter.


When providing us with the Complaint  # allocated to this complaint and in any correspondence addressed to us regarding this, kindly quote our reference for this complaint, being "Dieffe di Falco Angelo" so we can identify and correlate your correspondence with our own file on the matter.

We look forward to your co-operation in resolving this matter and in respecting our intellectual property rights.

We await to hear from you shortly



Ivan Lipshitz
Corporate Counsel
RAPAPORT
T.  +972-3-613-3330 x145
F.  +972-3-612-3343
Web.  www.diamonds.net<http://www.diamonds.net/>
Email. ivan.lipshitz@diamonds.net<mailto:ivan@diamonds.net>
